block.field: matplotlib.pyplot as plt import matplotlib.font_manager as fm fontprop = fm.FontProperties(fname='malgun.ttf')

shadow.field: 10. 트리 깊이에 따른 결정계수, MSE 그래프

block.field: def treeDepthScore(X, y, start=2, end=10): from sklearn.tree import DecisionTreeRegressor scores = [ ] for depth in range(start, end + 1): X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test = sklearn.model_selection.train_test_split(X, y, test_size=0.2, shuffle=True, random_state=0, stratify=None) tree = DecisionTreeRegressor(depth) tree.fit(X_train, y_train) scores.append(tree.score(X_test, y_test)) return depth_scores
